text.div:
HSPC Person Name Use value set

The set of values that describe the manner an individual uses a name.

This value set has an inline code system Intermountain Health Care HDD, which defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
188 Previous NameA name by which an individual previously identified by.
191 Preferred NameThe name by which an individual prefers to be known by.
812 Professional NameThe name by which an individual in known by professionally.

In addition, this value set includes codes from other code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v3-EntityNameUse
    CodeDisplay
    LLegal Name
    ASGNAssigned (alias)
  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v3-EntityNameuseR2
    CodeDisplay
    Mmaiden name

name: HSPC Person Name Use value set
description: The set of values that describe the manner an individual uses a name.

concept.definition: A name by which an individual previously identified by.
The name by which an individual prefers to be known by.
The name by which an individual in known by professionally.
